publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-432 Bill Wilson: Affordable Housingâ€”That the Parliament notes the difficulty that first-time buyers have entering the housing market and calls on the Scottish Government to examine the feasibility and implications of introducing an across-the-board open bids or fixed price system for the sale of housing property in Scotland.
S3M-432 Affordable Housing (lodged on 7 September 2007) Bill Kidd*
